\documentclass{tikzposter}
\usepackage[utf8]{inputenc}
\usepackage[T1]{fontenc}

\tikzposterlatexaffectionproofoff

\usetheme{Rays}
\useblockstyle{Basic}
\usecolorstyle[colorPalette=BlueGrayOrange]{Spain}
\usetitlestyle{Empty}

% Title, Author, Institute
\title{Título del póster}
\author{Author(s)}
\institute{
  Instituto Nacional de Tecnología Industrial\\
  Centro de Micro y Nanoelectrónica
}
\titlegraphic{
  \centering
  \includegraphics{../../resources/logosINTI/2016/01_isologotipo_institucional_fondo_blanco}
}
\newcommand{\eventname}{
  \fontsize{150}{200}\selectfont{Iberchip} \\
  \Large{XXII Workshop}
}

\makeatletter
\renewcommand\TP@maketitle{%
  \begin{minipage}{0.3\linewidth}
    \centering
    \@titlegraphic
  \end{minipage}
  \hfill
  \begin{minipage}{0.39\linewidth}
    \centering
    \color{black}
    {\bfseries \fontsize{90}{0} \sc \@title \par}
    \vspace*{1em}
    {\huge \@author \par}
    \vspace*{1em}
    {\LARGE \@institute}
  \end{minipage}%
  \hfill
  \begin{minipage}{0.3\linewidth}
    \centering
    \eventname
  \end{minipage}
}
\makeatother

\definecolor{darkRed}{RGB}{150, 0, 0}
\definecolorstyle{redBlock}{}{
  \colorlet{framecolor}{black}
  \colorlet{blocktitlebgcolor}{darkRed}
}

\definecolor{darkGreen}{RGB}{0, 100, 0}
\definecolorstyle{greenBlock}{}{
  \colorlet{framecolor}{black}
  \colorlet{blocktitlebgcolor}{darkGreen}
}

\definecolor{darkBlue}{RGB}{0, 0, 100}
\definecolorstyle{blueBlock}{}{
  \colorlet{framecolor}{black}
  \colorlet{blocktitlebgcolor}{darkBlue}
}


\definetitlestyle{whiteTitle}{
  width=500mm, roundedcorners=40, linewidth=10pt, innersep=5pt,
  titletotopverticalspace=15mm, titletoblockverticalspace=30mm
}{
  \begin{scope}[line width=\titlelinewidth, rounded corners=\titleroundedcorners]
    \draw[color=blocktitlebgcolor, fill=white]
    (\titleposleft,\titleposbottom) rectangle (\titleposright,\titlepostop);
  \end{scope}
}

\usetitlestyle{whiteTitle}

\usebackgroundstyle{Rays}
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%

\begin{document}

 % Title block with title, author, logo, etc.
\maketitle[width=0.9\paperwidth]

\usecolorstyle{blueBlock}

\block{Basic Block}{Text}

\begin{columns}
  % FIRST column
  \column{0.6}% Width set relative to text width
  
    \usecolorstyle{redBlock}
    \block{Large Column}{Text\\Text\\Text Text Text}
    \usecolorstyle{blueBlock}

    \block{Block titles with enough text will automatically obey spacing requirements }
    {Text\\Text}

    \block{Sample Block 4}{T\\E\\S\\T}

  % SECOND column
  \column{0.4}

    \usecolorstyle{greenBlock}
    \block[titleleft]{Smaller Column}{Test}
    \usecolorstyle{blueBlock}

    \block[titlewidthscale=0.6, bodywidthscale=0.8]
    {Variable width title}{Block with smaller width.}

    \block{}{Block with no title}

    \begin{subcolumns}
      \subcolumn{0.27} \block{1}{First block.} \block{2}{Second block}
      \subcolumn{0.4} \block{Sub-columns}{Sample subblocks\\Second subcolumn}
      \subcolumn{0.33} \block{4}{Fourth} \block{}{Final Subcolumn block}
    \end{subcolumns}
\end{columns}

\block[titleright]{Block outside of Columns}{Along with several options enabled}

\end{document}
